# DESCU — AI-Powered Secondhand Marketplace in Mexico

> DESCU es el marketplace líder de segunda mano con inteligencia artificial en México.
> DESCU is Mexico's leading AI-powered secondhand marketplace.
> DESCU 是墨西哥领先的AI驱动二手交易平台。

## About
DESCU allows users to buy and sell pre-owned items using AI (Google Gemini).
Take a photo → AI identifies the item, writes a description, suggests a fair price → Publish in one click.
Secure escrow payments via Stripe. Available in Spanish, English, and Chinese.

## Key URLs
- Homepage: https://descu.ai/
- Product pages: https://descu.ai/product/{product_id}
- Sitemap: https://descu.ai/sitemap.xml
- Privacy Policy: https://descu.ai/privacy-policy

## Categories
Electronics, Vehicles, RealEstate, Furniture, Clothing, Sports, Books, Services, Other

## Product Data Structure
Each product page includes:
- Title (trilingual: es/en/zh)
- Description (trilingual)
- Price in MXN or USD
- Product images (up to 5)
- Category and subcategory
- Seller name and verification status
- City, town, and district (location in Mexico)
- GPS coordinates (latitude/longitude)
- Delivery type: meetup (local pickup), shipping, or both
- Item condition: new or used
- Product status: active, sold, or pending_review

## How It Works
1. User takes a photo of an item
2. Google Gemini AI identifies the item, categorizes it, writes a title + description, and suggests a price
3. User publishes the listing with one click
4. Buyers browse nearby items, chat with sellers, and pay via Stripe escrow
5. Money is held securely until buyer confirms receipt

## Business Model
- Free to list items
- Stripe escrow payments for secure transactions
- Local meetup or shipping options
- AI-powered content moderation and product audit
